>Radio5 Pods and Blogs

20 Apr 2010

Fame at last? Well maybe just a little. Jemimah Knight was kind enough to let me come on her show, Pods and Blogs, on BBC Radio5. Had a lot of fun chatting to her about the project at work, Tales of Things. If you don't want to wait to hear it this evening, check out the Podcast where you can download the MP3. I come in towards the end but there's some cool stuff about TED in there too!
